message: Let's split it 60-40, fair and square!
You got a better offer in round 1, now it's my turn to make a better one!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. What do you say?
You're getting greedy, I'm going to try to cut you down to size!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not getting any younger. Can we make a deal?
